name: Surv
summary: Surv Is a 2d top-down shooter video game, you will evolve in an open world full of dangers to which you will have to face. You play the survivor of a large-scale epidemic that is slowly decimating people. The spell is cast, the world dies and the only remaining survivors are either eaten by zombies, died of hunger or worse ... Surviving will not be any rest between bad weather, zombies it will be very hard to find resources (weapons, ammunition, foods ...) to meet your needs.
